verses.verse: The <S%G4245>elders<s%> which are <S%G1722>among<s%> you I <S%G3870>exhort,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> am <S%G2532>also<s%> an <S%G4850>elder,<s%> and a <S%G3144>witness<s%> of the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2532>also<s%> a <S%G2844>partaker<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> that shall be <S%G601>revealed:<s%>

<S%G4165>Feed<s%> the <S%G4168>flock<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is <S%G1722>among<s%> you, taking the <S%G1983>oversight<s%> thereof, not by <S%G317>constraint,<s%> but <S%G1596>willingly;<s%> not for <S%G147>filthy<s%> <S%G147>lucre,<s%> but of a <S%G4289>ready<s%> <S%G4290>mind;<s%>
And when the <S%G750>chief<s%> <S%G750>Shepherd<s%> shall <S%G5319>appear,<s%> you shall <S%G2865>receive<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G1391>glory<s%> that <S%G262>fades<s%> not away.

<S%G3668>Likewise,<s%> you <S%G3501>younger,<s%> <S%G5293>submit<s%> yourselves to the <S%G4245>elder.<s%> <S%G1161>Yes,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> of you be <S%G5293>subject<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> to <S%G240>another,<s%> and be <S%G1463>clothed<s%> with <S%G5012>humility:<s%> for <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G5244>proud,<s%> and <S%G1325>gives<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> to the <S%G5011>humble.<s%>

<S%G5013>Humble<s%> yourselves <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> the <S%G2900>mighty<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that he may <S%G5312>exalt<s%> you in <S%G2398>due<s%> <S%G2540>time:<s%>
<S%G1977>Casting<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3308>care<s%> on him; for he <S%G3199>cares<s%> for you.

Be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> be <S%G1127>vigilant;<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G476>adversary<s%> the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> as a <S%G5612>roaring<s%> <S%G3023>lion,<s%> <S%G4043>walks<s%> <S%G4043>about,<s%> <S%G2212>seeking<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> he may <S%G2666>devour:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G436>resist<s%> <S%G4731>steadfast<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G3804>afflictions<s%> are <S%G2005>accomplished<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G81>brothers<s%> that are in the <S%G2889>world.<s%>

But the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5485>grace,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> has <S%G2564>called<s%> us to his <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> by <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> after that you have <S%G3958>suffered<s%> a <S%G3641>while,<s%> <S%G2675>make<s%> you <S%G2675>perfect,<s%> <S%G4741>establish,<s%> <S%G4599>strengthen,<s%> <S%G2311>settle<s%> you.
To him be <S%G1391>glory<s%> and <S%G2904>dominion<s%> for <S%G165>ever<s%> and <S%G165>ever.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>

By <S%G4610>Silvanus,<s%> a <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> to you, as I <S%G3049>suppose,<s%> I have <S%G1125>written<s%> <S%G1223>briefly,<s%> <S%G3641><s%> <S%G3870>exhorting,<s%> and <S%G1957>testifying<s%> that <S%G5026>this<s%> is the <S%G227>true<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>wherein<s%> <S%G3757><s%> you <S%G2476>stand.<s%>
The <S%G1577>church<s%> that is <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G897>Babylon,<s%> <S%G4899>elected<s%> <S%G4899>together<s%> with you, <S%G782>salutes<s%> you; and so does <S%G3138>Marcus<s%> my <S%G5207>son.<s%>

<S%G782>Greet<s%> you <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> with a <S%G5370>kiss<s%> of <S%G26>charity.<s%> <S%G1515>Peace<s%> be with you <S%G3956>all<s%> that are in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
